text: Ballylanders fort is a ringfort (rath) and National Monument located in County Limerick, Ireland. ==Location== Ballylanders fort is located 1 km (1,100 yd) north of Ballylanders town. ==Description== Ballylanders fort is a univallate rath, with two outer rings visible as cropmarks. The remains of a fulacht fiadh are nearby. ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in County Limerick Category:National Monuments in County Limerick
title: Ballylanders fort
